Text: Harborside Restaurant Portland OR Cc PST Duderemember the beer cheese soup Well as you know the wife is due with our nd child in May Well she had a craving today for beer cheese soup just like the stuff Harborside restaurant The weather here in Houston was really like Portlandmidslower s constant rain Anyway I searched the net for the recipethere are several different recipes but I wanted the Harborside recipe When I couldnt find it I just called the restaurant direct I spoke with the chef and he was extraordinarily kindhe not only put a copy of the recipe in the mail to us he took the time to go over the recipe with Jane Ann over the phone so we could cook it tonight Anyway I thought you mind find this slightly interesting Jeff
